testcase.classname: Customer should be able to search for a product
testcase.name: user should be able to add a product randomly

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: No of items not displaying Expected: a string containing "1 item" but: was "" at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20) at com.maven.sainsbury.stepDefinitions.BasketStepDef.userShouldBeAbleToViewTheProductInTheBasket(BasketStepDef.java:33) at ✽.Then user should be able to view the product in the basket(search.feature:34)
